gate.composite
Interface CompositeDocument

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable, Document, FeatureBearer, LanguageResource, NameBearer, Resource, Serializable, SimpleDocument
All Known Implementing Classes:
CompositeDocumentImpl
public interface CompositeDocument
extends Document

Composite document is a result of combining one or more documents altogether.

Author:
niraj
